code: import api from'./api';export const notificationService={getNotifications:async function(){let skip=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;let limit=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:20;const response=await api.get("/notifications/?skip=".concat(skip,"&limit=").concat(limit));return response.data;},markAsRead:async id=>{const response=await api.put("/notifications/".concat(id,"/read"));return response.data;},markAllAsRead:async()=>{await api.put("/notifications/read-all");}};
